_header: From Venice to Port Haifa by the sea
Note: For a text with many similar lines see 1613.
_description: William Wey, Itineraries to Jerusalem: Part I only (Parts II and III in Latin) — 352 lines in couplets

Bod565.First Lines:
ffro Venyse to port Iaff by the feeHyt ys ii M myle & hundrys
                    thre…
Bod565.Last Lines:
…By sydys thys place and sum what nyeAn Angyl bade Ioseph to
                    hye
Bod565.Attributed Title:
In this boke conteynyd ys the way to Ierusalem and the holy placys in that
                    sam contre (f. 8)
